svg.title: blockdiag
svg.desc:
{ colwidth = 32 node_height = 72
0-7: Major Client Version 
 (1 byte) 8-15: Minor Client Version 
 (1 byte) 16-47: Random 
 (32 bytes) 48-55: SessionID_Length 
 (1 byte) 56-63: SessionID 
 ($SessionID_Length$ bytes, 0 - 32 bytes) 64-71: Cookie_Length 
 (1 byte) 72-95: Cookie 
 ($Cookie_Length$ bytes, 1 - 2^8-1 bytes) 96-111: CipherSuites_Length 
 (2 bytes) 112-127: CipherSuites 
 ($CipherSuites_Length$ bytes, 2 - 2^16-2 bytes) 128-135: CompressionMethods_Length 
 (1 byte) 136-159: CompressionMethods 
 ($CipherSuites_Length$ bytes, 1 - 2^8-1 bytes) 160-167: (optional) Extension_Length 
 (2 bytes) 168-191: (optional) Extension 
 ($Extension_Length$ bytes, 0 - 2^16-1 bytes) }
